### PresenceResource



<div className='*:border-b [&>*:last-child]:border-b-0'><div className='text-sm text-fd-muted-foreground py-4'>

<div className="flex flex-row items-center gap-4">
  <code className="text-sm">guild_id</code>
  <code className="text-fd-muted-foreground">{"string"}</code>
</div>

ID of the guild



</div>
<div className='text-sm text-fd-muted-foreground py-4'>

<div className="flex flex-row items-center gap-4">
  <code className="text-sm">status</code>
  <code className="text-fd-muted-foreground">{"PresenceUpdateReceiveStatus"}</code>
</div>

Either "idle", "dnd", "online", or "offline"



</div>
<div className='text-sm text-fd-muted-foreground py-4'>

<div className="flex flex-row items-center gap-4">
  <code className="text-sm">activities</code>
  <code className="text-fd-muted-foreground">{"GatewayActivity[]"}</code>
</div>

User's current activities

See https://discord.com/developers/docs/topics/gateway-events#activity-object



</div>
<div className='text-sm text-fd-muted-foreground py-4'>

<div className="flex flex-row items-center gap-4">
  <code className="text-sm">client_status</code>
  <code className="text-fd-muted-foreground">{"GatewayPresenceClientStatus"}</code>
</div>

User's platform-dependent status

See https://discord.com/developers/docs/topics/gateway-events#client-status-object



</div>
<div className='text-sm text-fd-muted-foreground py-4'>

<div className="flex flex-row items-center gap-4">
  <code className="text-sm">id</code>
  <code className="text-fd-muted-foreground">{"string"}</code>
</div>
